notes.text:
This update for cifs-utils fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-14342: Fixed a shell command injection vulnerability in mount.cifs (bsc#1174477).
notes.title: Description of the patch

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5

notes.text: It was found that cifs-utils' mount.cifs was invoking a shell when requesting the Samba password, which could be used to inject arbitrary commands. An attacker able to invoke mount.cifs with special permission, such as via sudo rules, could use this flaw to escalate their privileges.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
